fields.name: University of G. d'Annunzio Chieti and Pescara

fields.title: The ScalaFix Equation Solver
fields.description: We present ScalaFix, a modular library for solving equation systems by iterative methods. ScalaFix implements several solvers, involving iteration strategies from plain Kleeneâ€™s iteration to more complex ones based on a hierarchical ordering of the unknowns. It works with finite and infinite equation systems and supports widening, narrowing and warrowing operators. It also allows intertwining ascending and descending chains and other advanced techniques such as localized widening.
